Vulnerability.Title: virtio-win enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: The virtio-win package provides paravirtualized network drivers for most Microsoft Windows operating systems. Paravirtualized drivers are virtualization-aware drivers used by fully virtualized guests running on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Fully virtualized guests using the paravirtualized drivers gain significantly better I/O performance than fully virtualized guests running without the drivers. This update adds the following enhancement: Windows 10 drivers are now included in the virtio-win Virtual Floppy Disk (VFD) file. (BZ#1345770) Users of virtio-win are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which adds this enhancement. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
